document.title: Schneider Electric InduSoft Web Studio and InTouch Machine Edition

product.name: InTouch Machine Edition: v8.0 SP2 Patch 1 and prior versions
InduSoft Web Studio: v8.0 SP2 Patch 1 and prior versions

notes.text: The stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability has been identified, which may allow remote code execution with high privileges.CVE-2017-14024 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 9.8 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: Users using InduSoft Web Studio v8.0 SP2 Patch 1 or prior versions are affected and should upgrade and apply InduSoft Web Studio v8.1 as soon as possible.
Users using InTouch Machine Edition v8.0 SP2 Patch 1 or prior versions are affected and should upgrade and apply InTouch Machine Edition 2017 v8.1 as soon as possible.
Schneider Electric has also released Security Bulletin LFSEC00000124
